general.gigTitle: provide wordpress website development and modern website design

sellerCard.description:
Greetings! I am a UK-based freelance web designer with over 8 years of experience in building captivating WordPress websites.
With a passion for design and an eye for detail, I will create a visually appealing website that perfectly aligns with your brand and effectively engages your target audience.
My work reflects my dedication to excellence. The reviews from my previous clients speak volumes about the quality and commitment I bring to each project.
Don't hesitate! Contact me and let's take the first step towards your online success.

description.content:
PROFESSIONAL WORDPRESS WEB DESIGN & DEVELOPMENT

Hey! I'm Naghmeh, a WordPress developer based in the UK.

Building websites isn't just my job its my passion


What Makes Me Your Perfect Choice:

When you work with me, you're not just hiring a WordPress developer you're getting someone who:


  • Loves Creative Challenges: Designing websites so visually stunning, they stand out in any crowd.
  • Solves Problems with Ease: Turning your just an idea into a digital masterpiece.
  • Delivers On Time, Every Time: Like your favourite Netflix series.
  • Communicates Clearly: You'll always know what's happening.
  • Handles Feedback Like a Pro: Listening to revisions and perfecting your vision.
  • Is Patience of a Saint: Listening to revisions even when Comic Sans enters the chat.


If you are using the WordPress.com hosting:

I am unable to build websites on WordPress.com HOST unless you have a BUSINESS plan , please contact me before ordering so we can find the best solution for you. 


I'd love the chance to build your website. Please feel free to visit my portfolio, I hope it inspires confidence in what I can create for you.


ï»¿Ready?

Book a consultation video call, and lets chat! :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to get started ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please share your website requirements in Inbox. Here is the list: - Objective for this website - Instructions for this project - List for Required pages and Features - Example/Competitor Website(s) - Website Branding

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide License for the wordpress theme or plugins you use?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I use Divi theme, which is licenced and can be auto update, but about the plugins I can use premium plugins that I have purchased but if you want to get regular updates from their developers then you will have to get your own license

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide support in future?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will provide support in the future 15 days support is free after order completion. Just send me a message for any type of maintenance of the website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you Redesign my site ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes i can redesign your website using your existing contents

questionsAndAnswers.question: Once the website is complete, can I update it myself?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, Even if you don't know any programming language, You can easily edit your website. This is the power of wordpress.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if I face any technical issue after the Completions of order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: If you face any issues related to the website after the delivery, please contact me at any time. I will be available and can assist you.

milestones.title: Planning
milestones.description: I'll use your provided requirements to start planning your website.

steps.title: Requirements
steps.description: We'll make sure I have everything needed to complete your project.

milestones.title: First draft
milestones.description: I'll prepare a first draft of the delivery.

milestones.title: Final Design
milestones.description: I'll deliver the final website design for your approval.

milestones.title: Development
milestones.description: I'll develop the website and deliver a working product for your review.

milestones.title: Delivery
milestones.description: I'll send you the final delivery for review and feedback.

reviews.comment: I cannot say enough positive things about Naghmeh!   Her work was exceptional and she went above and beyond with helping me!   I asked many questions and ALL were answered with a complete and easy to understand responses.  I have three additional projects and will 100% use Naghmeh's services!!!  You will not be disappointed with the work!!

For me creative thinking in terms of experience for MY customers is more important than timely delivery. Details are important, as well as brainstorming together to get the best possible solutions to get on the same page. All of this is realized. I would certainly work again with her IF another website project will be available.

Naghmeh certainly was a delight to work with. Her delivery time was spot on and she was more than happy to go the extra mile and beyond what her brief was. we are already engaging her in extending her services to us.

The project went very smoothly and the final project exceeded my expectations.  The quality of work, communications and promptness was terrific!  I've used Neghmeh on multiple projects and will continue to so as I am very satisfied!
Very happy with the website built.  Will continue to use!
